title: Why I can not access my account : [
body:
yesterday through my own LAN to this server and I played a few games , but this day will not let me know if it's for change or something ? :(
Sn: Psyduckz

replies.body: Can you give me a few more details on what error messages you're seeing when trying to login? This could be a technical issue or an issue with your actual account. Also if you could provide a screenshot that would help as well.
